input.sentences: family and friends prepare for their friends | the bride and groom | to arrive .
they arrive and talk to each other .
the brides father gives a touching speech about her .
the groom helps the bride cut the cake after wedding .
the bride 's dad then dances with his wife .
output.sentences: The wedding was nice and a handsome friend of the groom walked me to my seat.
I got a chance to talk to the happy couple before the ceremony.
I'd never heard the groom's father do much more than grunt before this, but he gave a beautiful, touching speech at the reception.
The groom helped the bride cut the cake using what looked like some kind of long sword.
Despite being divorced for 10 years, the groom's parents danced together and everybody clapped.
